summary: This mod adds four craftable blades to the game, a dagger, a short sword, a longsword, and a greatsword. Changed the scabbard and hilt to match the blade.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Mithril Blades
Author: Edhildil
6,25,2013
version 1




Please read all of the description before you post a comment.

[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This mod adds four craftable blades to the game, a dagger, a short sword, a longsword, and a greatsword.

These aren\'t average looking blades, they gleam like highly polished silver, not the dull tones of most swords around Skyrim. Made to match my Mithril Armors mod here: 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36838

Craftable under the \"steel\" catagory for easement, although it should be Moonstone or Dwarven for lore. 

Feel free to apply enchantments in game, if you are not already.

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

7/1/2013:  Changed the scabbard and hilt to match the blade.

 [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Latest Skyrim 1.9


 [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]

1)Unzip the file to a temporary folder and read the contents. (you are doing that now, but check file folder path)

copy/paste the data folder into your \"skyrim\" folder
(without the quotes). Activate the .esp 

 uninstall:
====================

delete included files and esp 

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Edhildil 


Tools:
========================
Blender
Gimp 2
Nifskope
CK
my brain, eyes, and hands

Cheers!

-E

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]


If you want to use my meshes or textures in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
